lead_paragraph: A chart in some editions on Wednesday with an article about Kansas City Royals pitcher Zack Greinke’s winning the American League Cy Young Award misspelled the surname of the Detroit Tigers pitcher who had 31 victories in 1968, nearly twice as many as Greinke’s 16 in 2009. He is Denny McLain, not McClain.
